name: Butterfly Aviation, Inc.
about: Butterfly Aviation, Inc., located at the Goodland Municipal Airport in Goodland, Kansas, is a dedicated flight training institution. The school offers comprehensive airplane flight training, with a focus on multi-engine aircraft instruction. As a Part 61 FAA-certified flight school, Butterfly Aviation provides professional and thorough training programs led by certified flight instructors. The school is committed to delivering high-quality aviation education, ensuring students are well-prepared for their aviation careers. With a strong emphasis on safety and compliance, Butterfly Aviation, Inc. is a reliable choice for aspiring pilots seeking rigorous and effective flight training.
